name: Handlebars Templates
description:
The Substitue() or RegexReplace() formulas are great for simple replacements, but when you have a ton of placeholders in your text they can get a bit cumbersome.

This Pack uses the Handlebars templating engine to make it easier to replace placeholders in templated text. Simply wrap your placeholders with double curly braces (like "{{name}}", etc) and then feel the values into the Template() formula to do the replacements.

=Template("Hello {{name}}", "name", "World") ðŸ ® "Hello World"

In addition to simple placeholder replacements, you can also use "if" statements to render text conditionally.

    Hello {{name}. {{#if day}} Happy {{day}}! {{/if}}

See the documentation at https://handlebarsjs.com/ for more information about the templating language.
